etomica.lattice.crystal

Class PrimitiveHCP4

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.lattice.crystal.Primitive
      • etomica.lattice.crystal.PrimitiveOrthorhombic
        • etomica.lattice.crystal.PrimitiveHCP4
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PrimitiveHCP4
extends PrimitiveOrthorhombic
    Orthorhombic primitive cell for an HCP system. Primitive-vector angles are 90 degrees and the vectors are of unequal length (1, sqrt(3), sqrt(8/3)). The hexagonal planes are perpendicular to the z axis.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PrimitiveHCP4

        public PrimitiveHCP4(Space space)
        Parameters:
        space - better be a Space3D. This is an IQ test.

      • PrimitiveHCP4

        public PrimitiveHCP4(Space space,
                     double a)
        Parameters:
        space - better be a Space3D. This is an IQ test.
        a - the lattice constant -- vectors will have length a, a*sqrt(3), a*sqrt(8/3)
